meanings.definition: To give a name or title to
meanings.sent2: The teacher denominated each student as a class leader.
meanings.sent3: The detective denominated the suspect 'The Sneaky Bandit'.
meanings.sent4: The artist denominated the painting 'The Colors of Joy'.
meanings.sent5: The chef denominated the dish 'Taste of Summer'.

meanings.definition: To express in a specified currency
meanings.sent1: The price was denominated in dollars.
meanings.sent2: He denominated the cost in euros for the international clients.
meanings.sent3: The birthday gift was denominated in chocolate coins.
meanings.sent4: Her love was denominated in hugs and smiles.
meanings.sent5: The value of the antique was denominated in gold coins.

meanings.definition: To specify a value in a particular unit of measurement
meanings.sent1: The length was denominated in meters.
meanings.sent2: They denominated the weight in kilograms.
meanings.sent3: The recipe denominated the ingredients in cups.
meanings.sent4: His speed was denominated in miles per hour.
meanings.sent5: The temperature was denominated in degrees Celsius.
